Oases
=====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which Oases installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using Oases, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load Oases/20180312-GCC-12.3.0
```
